about_the_game:
"The Robocraft Spooky Bundle offers a selection of scary cosmetics including Vampire Wings, a Spooky Mask and Spider Legs Cosmetics alongside 30 days of Premium membership and 1,000 Cosmetic Credits that can be used to forge cosmetic items in-game.

For more details on everything featured in this Steam-exclusive pack, please read below:

  • 1,000 Cosmetic Credits. Cosmetic Credits can be used in the Forge to create cosmetic parts to make your Robots stand out from the crowd.
  • 30 Days of Premium membership - more paint colours for use in the editor, double rate of experience level progression, a special Premium mothership design and triple robits when recycling items.
  • 4 Vampire Bat Wings
  • 2 Vampire Bat Rudders
  • 1 Complete Spooky Mask
  • 4 Spider Leg Cosmetic

Please note, the robots featured in the above promotional shots are not included in this bundle. This pack can only be purchased once per Steam account and after purchase the contents of this pack are awarded the next time the purchaser logs into Robocraft.
Note: Both Robits and Cosmetic Credits are required in order to Forge Cosmetic Weapon or Movement part Skins."

  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivalent AMD family
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768
